headline: Hasbro Launches Imaginative PLAY-DOH Barbie Playsets in Licensing Collaboration with Mattel; Toy Fair 2025 Attendees Can Get a First Look at the PLAY-DOH Barbie Product Line at the Javits Center, Booth #3435
summary: PAWTUCKET, R.I. & EL SEGUNDO, Calif- Hasbro, Inc. and Mattel, Inc. today announced the launch of a new PLAY-DOH Barbie collection from Hasbro's new licensing collaboration with Mattel. This unique...

headline: Hasbro Reports Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2024 Financial Results; Company Reports Improved Profitability and Earnings Growth; Issues 2025 Guidance and Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: Pawtucket, R.I-- Hasbro, Inc. , a leading games, IP, and toy company, today reported financial results for the fourth quarter and full year 2024.'I'm proud of our team for delivering what we promised...

headline: Hasbro Unveils New Strategy - Playing to Win
summary: PAWTUCKET, R.I- Today Hasbro, a leading games, IP, and toy company, is unveiling a new strategic plan, 'Playing to Win', taking the company through 2027. At the heart of Playing to Win is Hasbro's...
